timeline.bodyText: Instead of the substring check, can we explicitly list DNAction types that should be logged even in case of success?  I think that would be better for both performance and documentation.  It would also allow finer grained control.   I would consider keeping log for DELETE_BLOCK and DELETE_CHUNK.
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText:
Addressed in next commit. I have added DELETE_BLOCK to the list.
Left out DELETE_CHUNK for now as discussed in community call yesterday.
replies.author: dineshchitlangia
